valsi.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal or (with gi).
zgana modal, 1st place to observer ... ; witnessed by ...
$j_1$ plays baseball against $j_2$ in competition $j_3$ for prize/title $j_4$.
$j_3$ is a baseball match/game with $j_1$ playing/competing against $j_2$ for prize/title $j_4$.
$x_1$ is a french-fried potato of variety/cultivar $x_2$ cooked in fat/oil $x_3$
$v_1$ is a grate between $v_2$ and $v_3$ of material $g_2=x_4$.
upper-case letteral shift.
$g_1$=$z_1$ perceives $z_2$ to have quality $g_2$ by means/sense $g_3$=$z_3$ under conditions $g_4$=$z_4$.
attitudinal modifier/honorific: hauteur - equal rank - meekness; used with one of lower rank.
attitudinal modifier/honorific: hauteur - equal rank - meekness; used with one of equal rank.
attitudinal modifier/honorific: hauteur - equal rank - meekness; used with one of higher rank.
closed interval bracket marker; mod. intervals in non-logical connectives; include boundaries.
$x1=gr1=ga3$ is a latch/[closing rod] of material $x2=gr2$, closing $x3=ga1$, preventing passage to $x4=ga2$
$gas_1$ shuts $gan_1$, preventing passage/access to $gan_2$ by $gan_3$.
$s_1=m_2$ hums melody/song $s_2$ to audience $s_3$
location tense relation/direction; upwards/up from ...
$x_{1}$ is a cover/[lid/top] for covering/concealing/sheltering $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is an article/descriptor labelling description $x_{2}$ (text) in language $x_{3}$ with semantics $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_2$ is the noun phrase/sumti without the article/descriptor; description (($x_1$ with $x_2$) = gadysu'i); note: 'determiner' has become the accepted general linguistics term, displacing 'article'; however, 'determiner' includes all words that can introduce a noun phrase/sumti, whether a description or not, such as pronoun possessives like lemi, quantifiers (especially in indefinites) like ci and su'o, and demonstratives like ti, ta, and tu; the term 'descriptor' in Lojban, is limited to words that introduce descriptions (excluding indefinites), such as those of selma'o LA and LE, their common compounds such as lemi, and possibly lenu. 'article' typically refers only to a single word; Lojban assumes the broader meaning] See also {valsi}, {cmavo}.

valsi.definition: digit/number: hex digit C (decimal 12) [twelve].
$gas_1$ puts cover $gac_1$ on $gac_2$.
$d_1=g_1$ is a flood covering $g_2$.
$g_1=b_1$ is a forearm of $b_2$.
$c_1$ looks up at $c_2=g_1$.
$x_{1}$ (event) modifies/alters/changes/transforms/converts $x_{2}$ into $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Causal, resultative change; agentive modification (= {gafygau}, {gafyzu'e}). (cf. stika for non-resultative, binxo for not-necessarily causal change, cenba for non-resultative change; zasni)

valsi.definition: $gas_1$ elevates/raises $gal_1$ by height reference $gal_2$ and height standard $gal_3$.
$x1=g1=j1$ sinks/descends in frame of reference $x2=g2$ by amount $x3=j3$
$m_1$ rises to $m_2=g_1$ from origin $m_3=g_3$ via path $m_4$.
$p_1=g_1=t_1$ is the top (uppermost part) of $p_2$.
$x_{1}$ is high/up/upward in frame of reference $x_{2}$ as compared with baseline/standard height $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also upper; $x_3$ is generally some defined distance above a zero point/baseline, or is that baseline itself. See also {gapru}, {dizlo}, {cnita}, {drudi}, {farna}.

valsi.definition: $c_1=g_1$ is the lap of $t_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the throat/gullet [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: narrow(ing) opening of a deep hole].
$f_{1}$=$g_{1}$ is a/the pharynx [body-part] of $g_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Similar to pharanx (gr. cleft, chasm). Nasopharynx (={zbigalxyfe'a}), oropharynx (={molgalxyfe'a}), laryngopharynx/hypopharynx (={galxyferni'a}). See also {moldruji'o}, {galxe} and {fenra}.

valsi.definition: $g_1=p_1$ is the Adam's apple (laryngeal prominence) of $g_2=p_2$.
$x_1$ is a kumquat of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is December/twelfth month of year $x_2$ in calendar $x_3$.
valsi.notes: Note: Based on experimental rafsi for {gai} (gam). Use with caution. Alternative: {pavrelma'i}

valsi.definition: logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal conditional/only if (with gi).
$x_1=c_1=g_1$ is vast in dimension $x_2=g_2$ to observer $x_3=c_3=g_3$
$t_1$ is an ellipse (geometric form) of object/abstraction/manifestation $t_2$ (object/abstract) wide in dimension $x_3=g_2$.
$z_1$ narrows/contracts/is diminiished in dimension $g_2$ by amount $j_3$.
$x_{1}$ (portal/passage/entrance-way) is closed/shut/not open, preventing passage/access to $x_{2}$ by $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: As a doorway, but also perhaps a semi-permeable membrane. See also {kalri}, {pagre}, {canko}, {vorme}, {zunti}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is broad/wide in dimension $x_{2}$ [2nd most significant dimension] by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ [observer] senses/detects/notices stimulus property $x_{2}$ (ka) by means $x_{3}$ under conditions $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ is sensitive to $x_2$; also feels, spots, perceives, makes out, discerns/recognizes (but only implying reaction without necessarily any significant mental processing); note that the emphasis is on a property which stimulates $x_1$ and is detected (sanji is passive about the sensing, and is not limited to sensory input, as well as presuming some kind of discernment/recognition, while not being concerned with the means of detection); $x_3$ sense/sensory channel. See also {pencu}, {sanji}, {viska}, {sumne}, {tirna}, {zgana}, {canci}, {simlu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a/the testes/ovary/testicle/scrotum/balls/gonad/stamen/pistil [body-part] of $x_{2}$, gender $x_{3}$.
$d_1$ is a scrotum of $g_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a/the anus/anal orifice/asshole/arsehole [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: exit, waste exit].
valsi.notes: Also asshole/ass/arsehole; (adjective:) $x_1$ is anal. See also {zargu}, {kalci}, {mabla}, {rinci}.

valsi.definition: $z_1$ broadens/widens in dimension $g_2$ by amount $z_3$.
$x_{1}$ organizes $x_{2}$ [relative chaos] into $x_{3}$ [ordered/organized result] by system/principle(s) $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: $x_3$ is also a system; $x_4$ could be merely a function which inherently serves to dictate the organizational structure of $x_3$. See also {ciste}, {morna}, {stura}, {bilni}, {cabra}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is gaseous/fumes/a gas/vapor of material/composition including $x_{2}$, under conditions $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: $x_3$ includes temperature and pressure. See also {pambe}, {vacri}, {litki}, {sligu}, {danmo}, {bumru}, {cidro}, {flecu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a climb-below with surface climbed $x_{2}$ with climbing tool $x_{3}$. (omit, $x_{4}$ = gapru1 (above) = cpare3 (direction climbed)).
$x1=k1$ goes up to $x2=g1=k2$ from $x3=g2=k3$ via route $x4=k4$ by means $x5=k5$
$x_{1}$ is directly/vertically above/upwards-from $x_{2}$ in gravity/frame of reference $x_{3}$.
$f_2$ is turned up from $g_2$ in reference frame $g_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a rail/railing/bar [tool] supporting/restraining $x_{2}$, of material $x_{3}$.
$k_1=g_3$ is a/are the whisker(s)/sensory hair(s) /vibrissa(e) attached to $k_2=g_1$ at body part $k_3$ for the detection of stimuli $g_2$ under conditions $g_4$.
$x1=s1$ feels $x2=g2$ to $x3=g1=s3$ under conditions $x4=g4=s4$
$x_{1}$ [person/agent] is an agentive cause of event $x_{2}$; $x_{1}$ does/brings about $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: (cf. cmavo list gau, gunka, zukte, rinka, fasnu for non-agentive events, jibri, kakne, pilno)

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains steel of composition including $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ (event) is an illusion that deceives/tricks $x_2$ into sensing $x_3$ using sense $x_4$ under conditions x5
gasnu modal, 1st place agent/actor case tag with active agent ...
$t_1$ is an opportunity for $t_2=g_1$ to do $g_2$.
$p_1$ is toilet paper.
$gl_1$ rims/performs anilingus on $gl_2$.
$gl_1$ (giver) has anal sex with $gl_2=ga_2$ (receiver).
$k_1=g_2$ farts.
$k_1=g_1$ the committee for steering/organizing $g_2$ into $g_3$ by system/principle(s) $g_4$ of body/organization $k_3$.
logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal and (with gi).
mathematical operator: null mathematical expression (mex) operator (used in RefEntity "gt"2-ary ops).
attitudinal: elliptical/unspecified/non-specific emotion; no particular feeling.
logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal connective question (with gi).
shift letterals to Greek alphabet.
elidable terminator: end relative/modal phrases; usually elidable in non-complex phrases.
trinary mathematical operator: order of magnitude/value/base; [b * (c to the a power)].
$k_1=g_1$ cheers with sound $k_2$ about $g_2$ (event/state).
$x_1$ is a carrot of variety $x_2$.
$g_1=p_1$ is blissful about $g_2=p_2$ (event/state).
$d_1$ is grammatically correct in situation $d_2$ according to grammar $d_3=g_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a root [body-part] of plant/species $x_{2}$; [metaphor: immobile, supporting, nourishing].
$x_1$ is a carrot; $x_1$ is a root [body-part] of plant/species $x_2$ of genus Daucus
$x_{1}$ reflects Argentinian culture/nationality in aspect $x_{2}$.
$x_1=f_1$ parses text $x_3=g_3=f_3$ according to formal grammar $x_2=g_1$.
$x_{1}$ is a hook/crook [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_1=c_1=g_1$ barks expressing $x_2=c_3$.
$k_1$ is the howl of a dog/canine of species $g_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a dog/canine/[bitch] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is the grammar/rules/defining form of language $x_{2}$ for structure/text $x_{3}$.
$z_1$ is a doghouse for dog $z_2=g_1$.
$g_1=b_1$ is the Argentinian Spanish language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote)
$ge_1=gu_1$ is Argentina.
$n_1$ crochets $n_2$ from yarn $n_3$ using crochet hooks $g_1$
valsi.notes: g2 is dropped as being non germaine to this lujvo

valsi.definition: logical connective: all but tanru-internal forethought connective medial marker.
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought or.
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought and.
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought x but not y.
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought conn question.
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought biconditional/iff/if-and-only-if.
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought exclusive or; Latin 'aut'.
logical connective: bridi-tail afterthought whether-or-not.
$x_{1}$ (person/object/event) guides/conducts/pilots/leads $x_{2}$ (active participants) in/at $x_{3}$ (event).
valsi.notes: A guiding person advises/suggests/sets an example to be followed, but does not necessarily control/direct/manage actual execution of an event; an event may serve as a guide by setting a pattern/example to be emulated. See also {jitro}, {ralju}, {sazri}, te {bende}, {jatna}, {fukpi}, {morna}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a billion [British milliard] [$10^9$] of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_1$ is a chromosome containing gene/locus $x_2$ of species $x_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a camp/encampment/temporary residence of $x_{2}$ at location $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is group/cluster/team showing common property (ka) $x_{2}$ due to set $x_{3}$ linked by relations $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Also collection, team, comprised of, comprising; members $x_3$ (a specification of the complete membership) comprise group $x_1$; cluster (= {kangri}). See also {bende}, {ciste}, {cmima}, {gunma}, {panra}, {cabra}, {cecmu}, {kansa}, {klesi}, {lanzu}, {liste}, {vrici}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a (Lojban) root word expressing relation $x_{2}$ among argument roles $x_{3}$, with affix(es) $x_{4}$.
valsi.notes: Gismu list, if physical object (= ({loi}) {gimste}); referring to the mental construct (e.g. propose adding a new gismu to the gismu list = {gimpoi}, {gimselcmi}, {gimselste}). See also {cmavo}, {cmene}, {lujvo}, {smuni}, {sumti}, {tanru}, {valsi}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a string of instrument $j_1$.
$x_1$ is a capo for guitar/banjo/mandolin $x_2$.
$b_1=g_1$ is feverish/has a fever, from disease $b_3$, by standard $g_2$
$n_1$ is the heat of $n_3=g_1$.
$x_1$ is galangal of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ is hot/[warm] by standard $x_{2}$.
$s_1$ (mass of facts) is the science of thermodymanics / science of / about heat / heating based on methodology $s_3$.
valsi.notes: Made from {glare} and {saske}. saske2 and all places of glare subsumed.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is an owl of species $x_2$.
$x_1$ is in heat/estrus/musth; $x_1$ is horny/randy.
valsi.notes: zoi gy. musth .gy steci lo xanto

valsi.definition: $x_1=g_1=d_1$ desires sexual activity $x_3=d_2$ with participants $x_2=g_2$ for purpose $x_4=d_3$
valsi.notes: Noralujv's definition was scary. cf. {djica} and {gletu}

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is pornography/erotica about plot/theme/subject/under convention $c_2$ by author $c_3$.
$f_1$ reacts with orgasm $f_2$ to stimulus $f_3$ under conditions $f_4$; $f_1$ orgasms.
$x_{1}$ is happy/gay/merry/glad/gleeful about $x_{2}$ (event/state).
$p_1$=$g_2$ is a sexual partner of $p_2$=$g_1$.
$t_1$ is a tool/toy/instrument used for sex.
$x_{1}$ copulates/fucks/mates/has coitus/sexual intercourse with $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: $x_1$ and $x_2$ are symmetrical; mounts (= {cpanygle}). See also {cinse}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {vlagi}, {mabla}, {speni}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is a prostitute offering his/her services to $x_2$ for $x_3$ (payment).
$v_1$ (body) ejaculates $v_2$ from source $v_3$ via means/route $v_4$.
The English language.
$g_1=b_1$ is the English language used by $b_2$ to express/communicate $b_3$ (si'o/du'u, not quote).
$x_{1}$ is English/pertains to English-speaking culture in aspect $x_{2}$.
valsi.notes: Generally assume broadest sense of 'English'; may refer to 'English', pertaining to the country/people/culture of England (normally requiring constraint = gligu'e, or simply redundancy = gligli-); British English, the norm language of the UK (= {gliglibau}). (cf. {brito} which refers to the United Kingdom as a whole or to the British empire, {merko}, {sralo}, {kadno}, {skoto})

valsi.definition: $ge_1$ is English grammar for structure/text $ge_2$.
$g_1$=$b_1$ is the British English language, used by $b_2$ to communicate with $b_3$.
$gu_1$ is England (country).
$x_1$ is an England of peoples $x_2$ with territory $x_3$, being English in aspect $x_4$.
$x_1$ is an English person / is a person that shows traits $x_2$ related to England / English culture.
$x_1=g_1$ is Anglican in aspect $x_2=g_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a mitten/glove [hand and lower arm garment] of material $x_{2}$.
logical connective: forethought all but tanru internal biconditional/iff/if-and-only-if(with gi).
pro-bridi: repeats a recent bridi (usually not the last 2).
pro-bridi: repeats the next to last bridi.
pro-bridi: preceding bridi; in answer to a yes/no question, repeats the claim, meaning yes.
pro-bridi: preceding bridi; repeats claim as true, updating for speaker/listener change.
pro-bridi: repeats a future bridi, normally the next one.
pro-bridi: repeats a remote past bridi.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{-24}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
sumti assignment; used to define/assign ko'a/fo'a series pro-sumti; Latin 'sive'.
$x_1$ is a gombessa (coelacanth) of species $x_2$.
logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal exclusive or (with gi); Latin 'aut'.
$x_{1}$ is $10^{24}$ of $x_{2}$ in dimension/aspect $x_{3}$ (default is units).
$x_{1}$ [magnitude] is a unit/degree of/on scale/reference standard $x_{2}$ (si'o) measuring property $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also grade, level, point; $x_3$ dimension. See also {ckilu}, {kantu}, {kelvo}, {merli}, {ranti}, {selci}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ gram(s) [metric unit] in mass (default is 1) by standard $x_{3}$.
$x_{1}$ is a rod/pole/staff/stick/cane [shape/form] of material $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ is a quantity of/is made of/contains grease/fat/oil from source $x_{2}$.
$b_1$ ferries $b_2=p_1$ to $b_3=p_3$ from $b_4=p_4$ over barrier/medium/portal $b_5=p_2$.
$b_1$ is a ferry boat for carrying $b_2$ over barrier/medium/portal $x_3=p_2$ to destination $x_4=p_3$ from origin $x_5=p_4$.
$x_1$ is a grill/grid/graticle consisting of lines $x_2$
$g_1$ makes $x_2=p_1$ pass through $x_3=p_2$ to destination side $x_4=p_3$ from origin side $x_5=p_4$.
$n_1$ is $n_2$ years in duration by the Gregorian calendar.
$x_1=k_1$ is a hole in $x_2=k_2=p_2$ to/between $x_3=p_3$ from/and $x_4=p_4$ permitting passage by $x_5=p_1$.
valsi.notes: {pagre} + {kevna}. Precisely, $x_2$ is the barrier, $x_3$ is the inside, and $x_4$ is the outside, if distinguishable; loosely, $x_2$ might be given as the object consisting of both the barrier and the inside.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a frame/structure/skeleton/outline supporting/load-bearing/determining the form of $x_{2}$.
$s_2$ is the anthem of $g_1$.
$p_1$ is dough made from grain $g_1=p_2$
$p_1$ is flour made of grain plant/species $g_2$.
$x_{1}$ is gray [color adjective].
$s_1$ is a noodle of grain species $g_2$.
$x_{1}$ is a fruit [body-part] of species $x_{2}$.
$t_1$ is a silo for grain/cereal $t_2=g_1$
$x_1$ is a pomegranate (fruit of Punica granatum) of variety $x_2$
$x_1$ is a pineapple of species/variety $x_2$.
$x_1$ is buckwheat of variety $x_2$.
logical connective: forethought all but tanru-internal whether-or-not (with gi).
logical connective: tanru-internal forethought or (with gi).
logical connective: tanru-internal forethought conditional/only if (with gi).
logical connective: tanru-internal forethought and (with gi).
logical connective: tanru-internal forethought question (with gi).
logical connective: tanru-internal forethought biconditional/iff/if-and-only-if (with gi).
logical connective: tanru-internal forethought exclusive or (with gi); Latin 'aut'.
logical connective: tanru-internal forethought whether-or-not (with gi).
Guangzhou
valsi.notes: Based on the Chinese Mandarin pronunciation. For the name based on the local Cantonese pronunciation see {guonJAUS}.

valsi.definition: $gun_1=gub_1$ is a/the public sector owned by community $gub_2$ (mass) providing/producing $gun_2$ by process $gun_3$
$j_1$ advertises $jg_3=g_1$ (du'u) to $jg_2=g_2$ (mass) about subject $jg_4$.
$x_{1}$ is public/un-hidden/open/jointly available to/owned by all among community $x_{2}$ (mass).
$g_1=n_1$ is an advertisement about subject $n_2$ from author $n_3$ to audience $g_2=n_4$.
$c_1$ votes (in a public election) for $c_2$ among choices $c_3$ in electorate $g_2$.
$s_1=k_3=g_1$ is a paliamentary republic with representatives $s_2=k_1$ representating community $g_2=k_2$ (mass)
$p_1=g_1$ is a public square managed by/belonging to polity/community $p_2$.
$s_1=g_1$ is a republic governed by people $s_2=g_2$
$s_1=g_1$ is the reputation of c1 for $c_2$ (ka) known/imagined by $s_2=g_2$ (mass)
valsi.notes: From {gubni} {si'o} {ckaji}. In English, usually '$x_1$ is the reputation for $x_3$ that $x_2$ has with $x_4$'.

valsi.definition: $n_3$ publishes about subject $n_2$ with message $n_1=g_1$ to intended audience $n_4$.
$b_1$ defends country $b_2=g_1$ from threat/peril/potential $b_3$.
$n_2$ is a treaty between countries $n_1=n_3$
$x_{1}$ is the country of peoples $x_{2}$ with land/territory $x_{3}$; (people/territory relationship).
valsi.notes: Also sovereignty, domestic (as opposed to foreign), nation (when not referring to ethos). See also {turni}, {natmi}, {jecta}, {tumla}, {tutra}, {lanci}.

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 AR (Argentina) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 EU (European Union) for people $x_2$.
valsi.notes: EU is an exceptionally reserved ISO-3166 code. Cf. {rongunma}, {ropno}, {rontu'a}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 EG (Egypt) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 ES (Spain) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 ID (Indonesia) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 IQ (Iraq) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 IL (Israel) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 IN (India) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 IR (Iran, Islamic Republic Of) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 IT (Italy) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 UA (Ukraine) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 US (United States) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 ''BD'' (Bangladesh) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 BR (Brazil) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 CA (Canada) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 CN (China) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 ''CH'' (Switzerland) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 DE (Germany) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 FR (France) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 GB (United Kingdom) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 GR (Greece) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 JP (Japan) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 KP (Korea, Democratic People'S Republic Of) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 KR (Korea, Republic Of) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 MX (Mexico) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 NG (Nigeria) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 ''PK'' (Pakistan) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 PL (Poland) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 RU (Russian Federation) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 SU (USSR) for people $x_2$.
valsi.notes: SU is a ISO-3166 code exceptionally reserved from June 2008. Cf. {sofygu'e}, {softo}, {sesre}

valsi.definition: $x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 TR (Turkey) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 TW (Taiwan) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is the country with the code ISO-3166 ZA (South Africa) for people $x_2$.
$x_1$ is Korea.
$x_1$ is Nigeria.
$g_1$ is Norway.
$x_1$ is Poland.
$x_1$ is North Korea.
$x_1$ is Turkey
$x_1$ is Vietnam
$x_1$ is South Korea.
$g_1$ is Switzerland.
$x_1$ is Iran.
$j_1$ is the president of people $g_2$ in country $g_3$.
$n_1$ is a summit between $j_1=c_1$ (heads of state/government) about topic/subject $c_2$.
valsi.notes: x2 are usually presidents or prime ministers. x3 are points on an agenda (= snuselpla). Cf. {casnu}.

valsi.definition: $c_1$ is a supranational union of member states $g_1=j_1=c_3$
Google.
Google Wave
$x_1$ migrates to country $x_2$ from country $x_3$ over path/route $x_4$.
$k_1$ is a diplomat/ambassador representing country $k_2=g_1$ in matter(s)/function(s) $k_3$.
$k_1$ is international in aspect $x_2$
$p_1$ is a state/province/region (first-level administrative division) of country $p_2=g_1$.
valsi.notes: Cf.{gugde}, {pagbu}. A province or region can also be a second-level administrative division; for these use {gugypausle}.

valsi.definition: $s_1$ is a county/district/province (second-level administrative division) of country $s_2=g_1$.
valsi.notes: Cf. {gugde}, {pagbu}, {selci}. A province can also be a first-level administrative division; for this use {gugypau}, or optionally {vipygu'e} if it is in a country with a federal government.

valsi.definition: $g_1=c_1$ is sandy abrasive material.
$ga_1$ combines individual $gu_2$ into mass $gu_1$.
$gun_1=gug_1$ is a federative state consisting of states/lands $gun_2$
$d_1=g_1$ is a pool of water.
$x_{1}$ is industry/industrial/systematic manufacturing activity producing $x_{2}$ by process/means $x_{3}$.
$gunm_1$ is a project consisting of tasks $gunk_2$ done by $gunk_1$ with goal/objective $gunk_3$.
$x_{1}$ [person] labors/works on/at $x_{2}$ [activity] with goal/objective $x_{3}$.
valsi.notes: Also: $x_1$ is a worker/laborer. (cf. {sazri}, {gasnu}, {se} {jibri}; {zukte} - which need not be labor; physics term 'work' = {ni} {muvyselbai}, {briju}, {jibri}, {lazni}, {selfu})

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a mass/team/aggregate/whole, together composed of components $x_{2}$, considered jointly.
valsi.notes: A description in $x_1$ indicates of mass property(ies) displayed by the mass; masses may reveal properties not found in the individual set members that are massified, which themselves are not necessarily relevant to the mass property implicit in this bridi. See also {bende}, {girzu}, {pagbu}, cmavo list {loi}, {lei}, {lai}, {ciste}, {cmima}, {kansa}, {tinci}, {mulgunma}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=z_1=r_1=g_1$ procrastinates/avoids doing work $x_2=r_2=g_2$ (ka), instead doing $x_3=r_3$ (ka).
valsi.notes: I figured I'd FINALLY get around to defining this, only for it to be in order to delay doing homework. cf. {zukte}, {rivbi}, {gunka}, {dimna}, {funca}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ rolls/trundles on/against surface $x_{2}$ rotating on axis/axle $x_{3}$; $x_{1}$ is a roller.
$x_{1}$ is a goose/[gander] of species/breed $x_{2}$.
$x_{1}$ (person/mass) attacks/invades/commits aggression upon victim $x_{2}$ with goal/objective $x_{3}$.
$s_1$ is a communist ideology (default: Marxist-Leninist) as it applies to the governance of people/territory/domain $t_2$ based on the works of thinker(s) $s_3$
Canton
valsi.notes: Based on the local Cantomese pronunciation. For the name based on the Chinese Mandarin pronunciation see {guanJOUS}.

valsi.definition: $x_1=ga_1$ rolls object $x_2=gu_1$ on/against surface $x_3=gu_2$, with axis/ axle of rotation $x_4=gu_3$.
$x_{1}$ is grain/[British: corn]/cereal from plant/species $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is teff of variety $x_2$.
$x_{1}$ blade/scraper/erosive scrapes/erodes/abrades $x_{2}$ from $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a photon.
$x1=l1$ is a ray/beam/[line of light] illuminating $x2=g2$ from source $x3=g3$
$x_1$ is $x_2$ (default 1) light year(s).
$m_1=g_2$ is shiny/gleaming/bright/reflective of light $g_1=m_2$ from source $g_3$
$x_1$ [energy] is light/illumination illuminating $x_2$ from light source $x_3$.
valsi.notes: [$x_3$ illuminates/lights $x_2$ with light/illumination $x_1$; $x_2$ is lit/illuminated by illumination $x_1$ from source $x_3$ (= selgu'i for reordered places); light/lamp (= tergu'i)](cf. dirce, manku, solri, carmi, ctino, kantu)

valsi.definition: $n_1$ is Diwali (Deepavali) celebrated by $s_1$ with activities $s_3$
$x_{1}$ is a restaurant/cafe/diner serving type-of-food $x_{2}$ to audience $x_{3}$.
$b_1=g_1$ brightens under conditions $x_2=b_3$.
$x_{1}$ gleams/shines on to $x_{2}$, the light source being $x_{3}$.
$x_1$ is a lightning bug/glowworm/firefly of genus/species $x_2$.
$d_1$ extinguishes light $g_1$ illuminating $g_2$, the light source being $g_3$.
$x1=s1=m1$ flashes to $x2=m2$ from $x3=m3$ via $x4=m4$
$x_{1}$ is $x_{2}$ (default 1) short local distance unit(s) [non-metric], standard $x_{3}$, $x_{4}$ subunits.
valsi.notes: Foot (= {jmagutci}); yard (= {cibjmagutci}), pace (= {tapygutci}), inch (= {degygutci}), cubit (= {birgutci}). (additional subunit places may be added as $x_5$, $x_6$, ...); See also {mitre}, {clani}, {ganra}, {condi}, {rotsu}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.

valsi.definition: $x_{1}$ is a/the womb/uterus [body-part] of $x_{2}$; [metaphor: nourishing, protective, giving birth].
$c_1$ is the cervix of $c_2$
$c_1=g_2=p_2$ menstruates.
$k_1$ is a tank propelled by $k_3$.
$x_{1}$ is a melon/squash [fruit/plant] of species/strain $x_{2}$.
$x_1$ is a squash/pumpkin of species/strain $x_2$.
letteral for g.
